lab.title: Three Lab – visual examples
lab.subtitle: Pick an example and play with the controls.

tooltips.instanceColors: Give each copy its own color without new materials — in Instanced mode draw calls stay ≈ 1.
tooltips.mode_instanced: Instancing: many copies of the SAME geometry + material drawn with a single command (≈1 draw call per geo+material combo). Instead of 2000 'draw cone' commands, you send one: 'draw this cone 2000× with these transforms'.
tooltips.mode_naive: Each copy is a separate Mesh → ≈ N draw calls. Simpler, but slower at large N.

raycast.title: Raycasting
raycast.click: Click a cube to select it.
raycast.hint: Under the hood: Raycaster → intersectObjects → first hit.

weight.title: Weight tracking
weight.desc: Log your weight and see the trend

interview.title: Interview prep
interview.desc: Questions and visual examples: Three.js, React, Next.js, NestJS

filesystem.title: Folder structure
filesystem.desc: Generate and browse the file tree

storage.title: Storage & Cookies
storage.desc: Hands-on: localStorage vs sessionStorage vs cookies

abort.title: Abortable Fetch (AbortController)
abort.desc: Demo: debounce, fetch cancellation and a Stop button.

sso.title: SSO — login flow (Authorization Code + PKCE)
sso.desc: Authorization Code + PKCE step by step
sso.lead: Step through the SSO flow (/authorize → /callback → /token → session → /userinfo → Resource API) and see what happens at each stage.

authBox.title: SSO (real) — NextAuth (optional)
authBox.info: If you have NextAuth configured, use the links below to perform a real login.

recursion.title: Recursion — live nesting builder
recursion.lead: Build your own tree (files/directories) and step through recursion (preorder/postorder) and BFS.
